pt.ua.tm.neji.core.module

Interface Tagger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Module
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Hybrid, Reader, Writer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    A1Writer, Base64Writer, BaseHybrid, BaseReader, BaseTagger, BaseWriter, CoNLLWriter, DictionaryHybrid, DictionaryTagger, DTDTagger, EntityCleaner, IeXMLWriter, JSONWriter, MLHybrid, NejiWriter, RawReader, SentenceTagger, TagCleaner, XMLReader

    public interface Tagger
extends Module
    Interface that defines a tagger module. The Tagger module is able to change the stream to reflect new information.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
